welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Riverdale, a charming city known for its historic landmarks, friendly locals, and beautiful scenery. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport houses check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim areas.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing amenities such as lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'FTY Airport Wifi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is primarily used for private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and security checkpoint.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
